data.title: MUSHALPUR COLLEGE
data.text:
Know us at a Glance

Mushalpur College, Mushalpur was established in the year 1993 which is situated at the heart of the district head quarter of Baksa, Mushalpur. The College was affiliated under Gauhati University in 1996 and accorded Govt. Concurrence by the Govt. of Assam in 2008.

The college is also recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC), New Delhi, Govt of India u/s 2(f) of UGC Act 1956. No.F. 8-523/2017 (CPP-I/C) and registered under All India Survey of Higher Education, Govt. of India. Now the affiliation of the college has been transferred to Bodoland University under the provision of Bodoland University Act. 2009. The college has been imparting quality and value based higher education to the masses of the entire Mushalpur area. The College is trying to cope with the changing wholesome environment of higher education. It is trying to impart quality education to the students who basically come from economically unprivileged and geographically remote and backward areas. Keeping this objective in view, the College is functioning in all the fronts of educational field to uplift the educational scenario in greater Mushalpur area. Since inception the College has grown in leaps and bounds and has created an atmosphere in higher education.

Principal's Message

At the very outset on behalf of Mushalpur College family, I am very delighted to welcome to the fresherâ€™s who have admitted in this institution for their higher learning of arts for the session 2022-23. We know learning is a lifelong and never ending process from womb to tomb. Education helps to mold the desire attitude of living standard and make a good fellow of the society.

President's Message

It gives me immense pleasure to speak a few words about Mushalpur College, Mushalpur as the President of its Governing Body. Mushalpur College, Mushalpur was established as back as in 1993, having celebrated its 30th Foundation Day this year very recently on 22.06.2022. It is the only centre of higher education in the heart of Mushalpur, the District Head Quarters of Baksa district. Considering from the point of its age, the college should have been brought to the status better than it is now enjoying in all spheres like academic, official etc
